ALL webpages are written in HTML.

u download the template mod the html so its ur site and upload it

its not like it looks at th html and is like OMFG OMFG THIS IS A TEMPLATE RED ALERT RED ALERT CODE 666 CODE 666 HALT HALT ABORT AHHH SELF DESTRUCT SELF DESTRUCT!!!
